Title: Silverlight HTML 5 Canvas
Description: This project successfully uses Silverlight as a rendering engine to implement HTML 5 <canvas> support in IE6~IE8. It also enables onload=".." attribute support for native canvas renderers for 'this' context object activation.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project successfully uses Silverlight as a rendering engine to implement HTML 5 <canvas> support in IE6~IE8. It also enables onload=".." attribute support for native canvas renderers for 'this' context object activation.

For more information, visit
http://bit.ly/2BUyrW, http://bit.ly/vPEjy, and http://bit.ly/apkmQz

In-browser online demonstration: http://silverlightcanvas.appspot.com/

Static file reference for <script src="..">: http://silverlightcanvas.appspot.com/static/slcanvas.js
